mapper.update: update fc_plan set deleted = 1 where plan_id = #{planId}
update fc_plan set status = #{status}, update_time = LOCALTIMESTAMP where plan_id = #{planId} and deleted = 0
update fc_plan set status = #{status}, review_admin_id = #{adminId}, review_time = LOCALTIMESTAMP where plan_id = #{planId} and deleted = 0
mapper.select:
select
from fc_plan as t9 left join fc_plan_building as t10 on t9.plan_id = t10.plan_id where t9.plan_id = #{planId} and deleted = 0

select t11.ready_commit_id,t11.param_type,t11.status,t11.create_time, t10.building_id,t10.building_name, t9.plan_name,t9.plan_code,t9.plan_start_time,t9.plan_end_time from fc_plan as t9 join fc_plan_building as t10 on t9.plan_id = t10.plan_id join fc_ready_commit as t11 on t10.plan_building_id = t11.plan_building_id where t9.deleted = 0 and t9.plan_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{planName}), '%') and t9.plan_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{planCode}), '%') and TO_CHAR(t9.create_time, 'yyyy-MM-dd') between #{startDate} and #{endDate} and t11.status = #{status} and t11.param_type = #{paramType} and t10.building_name = #{buildingName} order by t9.create_time desc

select t9.plan_id,t9.plan_start_time,t9.plan_end_time,t10.building_id,t10.building_name from fc_plan t9 left join fc_plan_building t10 on t9.plan_id = t10.plan_id where t9.plan_id = #{planId} and t9.deleted = 0

select t9.plan_version,t7.version as lease_version,t8.version as business_version from fc_plan t9 join fc_lease_fee_param t7 on t7.plan_id = t9.plan_id and t7.deleted = 0 join fc_business_param t8 on t8.plan_id = t9.plan_id and t8.deleted = 0 where t9.plan_id = #{planId} and t9.deleted = 0 limit 1
